tool_description: Builds container images from source code with specified runtime configurations and dependencies.

source_path.description: Path to the source code directory or repository URL

dockerfile_path.description: Path to Dockerfile relative to source_path

image_name.description: Name for the resulting container image

error_messages: Source path not found: Ensure the source_path exists and is accessible.
Dockerfile not found: Verify dockerfile_path is correct relative to source_path.
Invalid image name: Image name must follow Docker naming conventions (lowercase, alphanumeric, hyphens, underscores).
Build failed: Check Dockerfile syntax and ensure all dependencies are available.
Invalid build args: Build arguments must be in KEY=VALUE format.
usage: Provide source_path, image_name, and optionally dockerfile_path, image_tag, and build_args. The tool builds the container image and returns build details.

image_id.description: Unique identifier of the built image

image_size.description: Size of the built image in MB
